plurals.name: dialog_merge_invalid_file_message
plurals.item: Merge operation is not supported for the selected file. It may be corrupted, it may contain proprietary \"XFA extensions\" that are not part of the PDF standard, or it may contain additional files. For password protected files, you can merge them via the thumbnails view inside the viewer.

Merge operation is not supported for some of the selected files. They may be corrupted, they may contain proprietary \"XFA extensions\" that are not part of the PDF standard, or they may contain additional files. For password protected files, you can merge them via the thumbnails view inside the viewer.

resources.string: continue using PDF Reader and Writer
There was a problem trying to create the file.
CompleteReader is a sample app that demonstrates how to build a complete PDF viewer and editor using pdftron PDFNet SDK.
This will clear all of the files from the favorite documents list.
This will clear all of the files from the recent documents list.
This folder already exists. Please use another name.
There was a problem trying to create the folder. Please try again.
Invalid folder name. Only upper and lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores are accepted.
It was not possible to delete \"%1$s\".
An error occurred trying to delete the files.
Are you sure you want to <font color=#FF0000>permanently delete</font> \"%1$s\"?
Do you want to <font color=#FF0000> delete</font> %1$d files and %2$d folders in \"%3$s\"? All files and subfolders will be deleted.
Are you sure you want to <font color=#FF0000>permanently delete</font> these files?

In the %1$s tab, your SD Card files are read only and you cannot %2$s files.

Please navigate to the SD Card tab, where %3$s has write access to your SD Card files.
On KitKat devices apps no longer have permission to write to an external SD card. %1$s
It seems like your device does not support this functionality. %1$s
This file will be opened as read-only. To modify, open it using the \"SD Card\" tab located in the side navigation drawer where %1$s has write access. %2$s.
Open files stored on the SD card using the \"SD Card\" tab located in the side navigation drawer. Android restricts access to files on the SD card %1$s.
An error occurred trying to merge the files.
\"%1$s\" already exists at this location. Do you want to replace it with the file you\'re moving?
Are you sure you want to remove access to \"%1$s\"? The folder will not be deleted.
An error occurred trying to remove \"%1$s\".
An error occurred trying to remove the folders.
Are you sure you want to remove access to these folders? The folders will not be deleted.
In your web browser, open the ⋮ menu, select Share…, and choose Convert to PDF.
Open this document using the \"SD Card\" tab located in the side navigation drawer to modify this document.
Are you sure you wish to download this file (%1$s) using your mobile data connection?
There was a problem trying to duplicate the file. Please try again.
There is insufficient storage space on the device. Please clear space and try again.
Maximum number of duplicated files reached. Please delete unnecessary files and try again.
This file has been damaged. %1$s tried to repair it but could not, so it cannot be opened. Sorry!
Failed to open folder. Please try again.

resources.string: There is a problem with this image. Please try loading it again.
Unfortunately %1$s could not be converted to a PDF.

To get license key, please go to pdftron website to request trial.

Then add your license key to gradle.properties file:
PDFTRON_LICENSE_KEY=YOUR_LICENSE_KEY.

Change permissions in your device\'s settings.
Give %1$s access to Storage.
Permissions were not granted. Enable in settings.
When enabled, page will turn when tapping on the left or right edge of the viewer.
When enabled, the annotation list displays the annotation\'s author.
Default author name for your annotations.
When enabled, the annotation toolbar does not return to the hand tool after an annotation is created.
When enabled, the text of a highlight/underline/strikeout annotation is automatically copied into the annotation\'s note.
This can take up to a couple minutes.
List of available fonts for free text annotations.
When enabled, the system bars will be hidden when viewing a document.
When enabled, some images will look better, but loading them might be a little slower.
When enabled, ink drawn with a finger is smoothed. (Stylus ink is never smoothed)
When enabled, multiple documents will be opened in a single viewer.
When enabled, page will turn with animation when tapping on the left or right edge of the viewer.
Whether the page fit screen by page width or page height
When enabled, documents opened from the Recent List are reopened on the last page they were on.
When enabled, the viewer\'s Page Display dialog includes an option to enable right-to-left document support.
When enabled, the screen will stay on as long as you are viewing a document.
When enabled, annotations with comments will display a note icon.
When enabled, the annotation will be selected after it is created with the toolbar.
When enabled, the stylus will create (and edit) annotations, and a finger will scroll and zoom the viewer.
Display and annotate documents on Android
Square And Piece Corner Radius Example

string.comment: When filtering files, if there are no files of the selected types, we display this message
string.name: textview_empty_because_no_files_of_selected_type

resources.string: No documents of the selected file types. (┐◎_◎┌)

string.comment: When filtering files, if no files match the string, we display this message
string.name: textview_empty_because_no_string_match

resources.string: No documents match the text filter.

No external storage folders selected.
Step 1: Click + to select a root path.
Step 2: Choose the external SD card from the drawer. 
Step 3: Confirm selection.
To favourite a document, use %1$s\'s file browser to find the document, and then tap the document\'s info
Access has not been granted to any SD-card folders
